title: Rek'Sai
body: I think Rek'Sai could use a tiny buff.  A slight slow on her Q when she's burrowed.

replies.body:
Rek'Sai has been on the brunt end of way too many nerfs, in my opinion. Yeah she was a little overtuned when she was first released, but they continued to nerf her little by little until she became pigeon-holed into building tank due to one powerful form of CC (Hello Elise). I use to love playing Rek'Sai top, but after the most recent nerf to her rage generation upon resurfacing, she just cannot sustain herself against characters with way more powerful kits (which includes practically every top laner). 

Interesting, unique champion turned "knock-up bot"
I agree, she's just a knockup bot at this point :(

I'd rather see some sort of sustain type added to her kit like a shield when using q or life steal in the e. Her numbers are very low right now after a string on unnecessary nerfs so she should become unnecessarily broken.

As a Rek'Sai main myself I feel as if removing the burrows increased movement speed but gaining a very strong ms buff when moving twords units hit by the prey seeker because idk a ability called PREY SEEKER, should kinda give you the ability to close in on them...

Arguably the smartest suggestion I've read on Rek'sai in a while.

Tones down her free mobility, but gives her a useful and thematic tool.

*Edit:  I read that as being for when you hit champions, not all units.
lol what are you smoking? if anything she needs more nerfs
sounds like something someone that doesn't know how to play against her says
I think a better buff would just be a bit more natural tankiness. A slow would be nice but just being able to survive past your knockup in teamfights would be nice.

Arguably the safest jungler in the game.  Strong at all stages of the game with unparalleled unique utility and permanent map uptime post 6.

Rek'sai needs no buffs and I'd argue further nerfs are warranted.
